about: Plant and Food Research NZ - Metadata Schema

dataset_fields.label: Title
dataset_fields.form_placeholder: e.g. FAR Insecticide residue activity to cereal aphids, Pot Trial, 2016

dataset_fields.label: Description
dataset_fields.form_placeholder: Describe the when, where, how and why for this dataset.

dataset_fields.label: Keywords
dataset_fields.help_text: What information you think will be useful to help you or others search for your data? Think about what your future self might want to search for, or what would you want to search for in work that you did five years ago. What was the question, study species/system/crop, key effects, methods used, specific machine, site, key methodology..., anything else?

dataset_fields.label: Project Code
dataset_fields.help_text: The project code under which the data was initially collected. If it is unofficial exploratory work this can be left blank, Other codes can be entered further down

dataset_fields.label: Project leader
dataset_fields.help_text: Project leader for the code as entered above and as in SAP

dataset_fields.label: Lead Researcher
dataset_fields.help_text: Person leading this piece of research, may be the same as project leader.

dataset_fields.label: Data custodian
dataset_fields.help_text: Person responsible for the management of the data (usually not the data steward).

dataset_fields.label: Other project codes
dataset_fields.help_text: List of other projects using this data, may be empty

dataset_fields.label: Funding source
dataset_fields.help_text: e.g. SSIF, Commercial , as listed in SAP

dataset_fields.label: Location
dataset_fields.help_text: Use site select list below or enter GPS location or plot locoation

dataset_fields.label: License
dataset_fields.help_text: License definitions and additional information can be found at http://opendefinition.org/

dataset_fields.label: Organization
dataset_fields.help_text: Use PFR collection unless you need more control over visiblity

resource_fields.label: Name
resource_fields.form_placeholder: eg. Trial of insecticides applied to plants in pots in a greenhouse, with data collected at five assessments

resource_fields.label: Description
resource_fields.form_placeholder: Some useful notes about the data
